page.title: 08 "COMMUNICATIONS"
page.content: {Bus services}:-run frequently between Derby and Ashbourne on the main A52 and infrequently between the village { Railways}:-None { Airports}:-None { Vehicles}:-Most families have their own cars/motor cycles/cycles. { Postal service}:-Lettres+ small packets are delivered to dwellings daily-except Sundays. Large parcels also delivered daily by van. Lettres: 17p-1st class, 13p-2nd { Telephone}:-Most people communicate by telephone and charges for lines are Â£15.15 per qtr-Exclusive & Â£14.10 per qtr-Shared Line. Calls cost:-5p/5mins Cheap rate 6pm-8am. 5p/2mins Standard rate 8-9am, 1-6pm. 5p/min, 11p/2mins, 22p/5mins Peak rate 9am-1pm.
